title: Coleen Rooney doubles down as she says it's 'irrefutable' leaks came from Rebekah Vardy
text:

Coleen Rooney has doubled down on Rebekah Vardy by saying she has irrefutable evidence that the leaks came from her account.

Wayne Rooney's wife put in some serious detective work after becoming suspicious that information from her private Instagram account was being leaked to the press.

Mum-of-four Coleen says after becoming convinced it was Rebekah, she made it so that only she could see her Insta Stories, posting fake ones to see if they'd leak.

And when the stories came out, Coleen publicly accused Rebekah of selling tales on her.

Rebekah denied it, but Coleen says there's no question as to who is behind it all.

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

A spokesperson for Coleen said: "It is irrefutable that the leaks came from one account, and one account only."

Coleen has been nicknamed Wagatha Christie due to her sly detective work, but Rebekah has insisted she's done nothing wrong.

Hitting back in her own statement, she said: "As I have just said to you on the phone, I wish you had called me if you thought this.

(Image: Twitter)

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

"I never speak to anyone about you as various journalists who have asked me to over the years can vouch for.

"If you thought this was happening you could have told me & I could have changed my passwords to see if it stopped.

"Over the years various people have had access to my insta & just this week I found I was following people I didn't know and have never followed myself.

(Image: Daily Mirror)

"I'm not being funny but I don't need the money, what would I gain from selling stories on you?

"I liked you a lot Coleen & I'm so upset that you have chosen to do this, especially when I'm heavily pregnant.

"I'm disgusted that I'm even having to deny this. You should have called me the first time this happened."

description: Wayne Rooney's wife has accused Jamie Vardy's wife of leaking stories about her to the press - but Rebekah denies it
